about_the_game:
Overview: Dive into the exhilarating world of Medieval Marathon, an endless runner game that challenges your reflexes and quick thinking! Glide through an ever-changing Pathway, filled with obstacles, multipliers, and breathtaking scenery.


Gameplay: In Medieval Marathon, you take on the role of an adventurer with a quest to seek out as much gold as possible while eluding the knight’s guard. Your mission is simple: keep moving forward while dodging obstacles and collecting gold bars to achieve the highest score possible. The further you go and the more gold you collect, the faster and more challenging the game becomes.

Features:
  • Dynamic Environments: Navigate through diverse landscapes including medieval street scenes with unique challenges and visuals.
  • Intuitive Controls: Use simple AD + C (Slide) + SPACE (Jump) to dodge obstacles, jump over objects, and perform sliding techniques to go under obstacles.
  • Boosts: Collect gold bars to help you achieve a multiplier with every gold bar obtained for a higher score.

Target Audience: Medieval Marathon is perfect for players of all ages who enjoy fast-paced action and challenging their reflexes.

This is our first game as we jump into the game development market. There are no ads or in game purchases. Buying this game helps support us as we build bigger, better, more complex games!
